sentences.en: A small child's confusion in distinguishing the right from the wrong is quite natural.
sentences.cn: 小孩子不明是非是很正常的.

sentences.en: Another way to work smarter is by distinguishing busy from productive.
sentences.cn: 另外一种巧干之道是区别能干和忙碌.

sentences.en: Command of the mother tongue is the most distinguishing mark of the educated man or woman.
sentences.cn: 运用本国语言的能力是受过教育的人最明显的标志.

sentences.en: He was rejoiced at so early an opportunity of distinguishing his faith in his new sect.
sentences.cn: 他很高兴这么快就能有机会表明他新近才参加的教派的信仰.

sentences.en: I see you've been distinguishing yourself at school again. I have had a lot of complaints about your behavior.
sentences.cn: 我知道你又在学校里炫耀自己了, 我对你的举止不知埋怨过多少次了.
这是他们与众不同的特征.

sentences.en: Its only aim was to give rules for distinguishing between correct forms and incorrect forms.
sentences.cn: 它的唯一目的是要订出一些规则,区别正确的形式和不正确的形式.

sentences.en: Marriage has such moments, but they are not its most distinguishing features.
sentences.cn: 婚姻有如此的时刻, 但它们不是它最明显的特点.

sentences.en: Morality of cause differs from professional morality with its own distinguishing features.
sentences.cn: 事业道德不同于职业道德,它有职业道德所不具有的特点.

sentences.en: Research suggests that babies learn to see by distinguishing between areas of light and dark.
sentences.cn: 研究表明婴儿通过辨别光亮和黑暗的区域来学会看东西。

sentences.en: The basic gimmick was the distinguishing of one bank from the others.
sentences.cn: 基本决窍是区分某一银行与其它银行的标志.

sentences.en: The chief distinguishing feature is their tenacity of life.
sentences.cn: 其主要特征就是他们生命力之坚强.

sentences.en: The Court found several bases for distinguishing Marchetti's situation from the Shapiro decision.
sentences.cn: 法院找出若干区分"马切蒂 " 案的情况和"夏皮罗"案的裁定的基点.

sentences.en: There are a number of distinguishing characteristics by which you can identify a Hollywood epic.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的史诗大片有着一些与众不同的特点。

sentences.en: Warm, vital piety is one of the distinguishing marks of the catechism.
sentences.cn: 热情而有活力的敬虔是这个教理问答独特的标记之一.

words.tran_cn: 明显的；独特的；清楚的；有区别的
可区别的；辩认得出的；可辨识的
区别；差别；特性；荣誉、勋章
区分；辨别；使杰出，使表现突出

trans.tran_cn: 辨别，区别( distinguish的现在分词 )，使出众，（凭任何感觉器官）识别出，看清
